question: June 17 is celebrated as the ________________.
option4: World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
answer: World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
explanation: June 17 is celebrated as the World Day to Combat Desertification has been observed to promote public awareness relating to International cooperation to combat desertification and the effects of drought. It was an additional opportunity to increase awareness raising and participation in the process.
